lenders.name: Pia McGovern, CPDT
lenders.loan_because: It’s so important for a person’s self esteem and respect to be able to be self sufficient and independent. When a person is motivated and wants to make it for him and her self we should support and encourage that!  For me it's wonderful to be in a position to be able to help out knowing it's going to potentially make a big difference in someone else’s life.  Being a small business owner myself I know how hard it can be to get a business off the ground and any help and support is very valuable and so appreciated, no matter how small!
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with people and their dogs.  I teach the dog owner how to best work with their dog and to accomplish desired goals using positive reinforcement and motivational techniques both for the dog and the owner.  I offer group obedience classes and also go to people’s homes.  Many of my clients have dog or people aggressive dogs, which is what I specialize in.

lenders.occupational_info: I look after other peoples money for a living.  Those who want to borrow can look after mine for a change!

lenders.occupational_info: I help people in an emergency and I am fortunate to make a living at it.

lenders.name: MAKAI PRODUCTIONS
lenders.loan_because: Good actions give strength to ourselves and inspire good actions in others. ~Plato

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in sharing opportunity. Its the right thing to do.  
Plus, I enjoy seeing other people fulfilling their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: As a restoration contractor, I make old things look new again.

lenders.name: King of Floppy Hats, EC
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Peter & Sara
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to 'ensure a person has the tools they need to catch their own fish' rather than just giving them the fish.
lenders.occupational_info:
Peter is a high school counselor. He helps students realize that the future is imminent, and that they need to take action. He helps them choose classes that complement their goals.

Sara is a college student. She is getting a degree in Molecular Bioscience & Biotechnology, and plans to attend graduate school.

lenders.name: Becky
lenders.loan_because: People helped me when I needed it. Now, I am in the position to help others.

lenders.name: Anderson
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Lesly
lenders.loan_because: I can! I want my children to see that a small gesture can make a big difference, that believing in something can make it happen, and that if we all do our part, we can make the world a better place.

lenders.name: jessica
lenders.loan_because: Sharing the wealth
lenders.occupational_info: Finding out what needs to be done, when, and by whom.  Then keeping them organized to finish the job!

lenders.name: Melody
lenders.loan_because: Micro-loans are the greatest means of empowerment in a global economy.
lenders.occupational_info: My life work focuses on social activism in the areas of health, housing and global citizenship.

lenders.name: Presti Family
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a shot at being their own boss.

lenders.name: Stanfield
lenders.loan_because: I beleive if you can conceive, then you will acheive to succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I support dreams,visions into reality promoting life!

lenders.name: Joe and Nancy
lenders.loan_because: we're grateful for what we have.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell their homes

lenders.name: Mattie
lenders.occupational_info: I sell medical drugs that save lives of people who are ill. I sell directly to hospitals.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I am able to do it, even though I am not wealthy; my life is full; it allows me to connect with people all over the world; it feels good; all of my teachers taught me giving is a gift and it is!
lenders.occupational_info: As a biologist, I work to understand the factors contributing to the decline of species. Then, I mechanically remove impediments and rebuild and restore habitats to allow threatened and endangered species to, at the very least, survive another day.

lenders.name: Sotiros (Sid)
lenders.loan_because: It's God's Holy Will

lenders.name: Dustin
lenders.loan_because: Initiative is something that should be given an opportunity, regardless of where you are born.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a senior in high school with a variety of interest.  I enjoy business, politics, music, and sports.

lenders.name: Ardeane
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: Trying to help others.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with health,  a beautiful smart healthy daughter, and a good life. I feel it is my obligation to help others that are in need and that are trying to better themselves and their families. Thank you Kivi for giving all these wonderful inspiring people to us, so we can share in their future and share all this good will and love. Because that is what all "this is" about...love

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: because I care.

lenders.name: Alice
lenders.loan_because: I like the feeling of helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked as a nurse in Public Health for 25 years. I am now retired and raise puppies for Southeastern Guide Dogs, Inc. I also have a therapy dog that assists in physical therapy and works with special needs children.

lenders.name: Colin & Sarah
lenders.loan_because: loans helped us through college and allowed for our successful and happy lives
lenders.occupational_info: We sell medicines to sick people.

lenders.name: Karen & Tina
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help children understand the importance of giving to others....
lenders.occupational_info: we work with children who are deaf and hard of hearing

lenders.name: Jaclyn
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me, so that I may bless others.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I understand an entrepreneur's need for a small loan to make a big difference in their business.

lenders.name: Bob & Mary
lenders.loan_because: We celebrated our 50th wedding anniversary (2007) this year.  We want others to share in our good fortune!

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: A donation to Kiva is the gift that keeps on giving. How cool is that?!
lenders.occupational_info: I write a column with all sorts of information. (Recipes, crafts, stories, photos, etc.) Check it out &  subscribe for free!

lenders.name: Mike V. Christensen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: We supply gasoline ,dieselfuel and propane tocompanies and indivials

lenders.name: JET
lenders.loan_because: For my sister Janett Elaine Talkington.She passed away on May  18,2007.I started jet outreach for her.She was my mother,sister,friend.Jan will always be missed.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.whereabouts: Surry Hills NSW New South Wales

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed to make my living in agriculture in the US. If my small loan can help someone else be successful in agriculture, the world is a slightly smaller, slightly better place.

lenders.name: Tammy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write books that inspire, motivate, and help change the way people think about themselves and the world.

lenders.name: Blake
lenders.loan_because: it is a great way to help people out

lenders.name: Ed and Donna
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we are able to do so. My family is fortunate to be able to afford assisting others. There is SUCH a need. We hope that our small loans can combine with others given worldwide to truly make a difference in other's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Last summer I retired from my job a a purchasing agent in Oregon. I now enjoy volunteering, travel and having more time at home. I hope my retirement will enable me to make a difference in the lives of those less fortunate than I am.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my many blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have raised 7 children.  We have 5 sons and 2 daughters.  We have 5 grandchildren.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way I can help reduce poverty in our world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a proud gamer.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: This is in memory of my mother who was my best friend and always supported me and was there to help me out when it was needed. She had a big heart and cared about everyone and this is why I am the person I am today.
lenders.occupational_info: The best job to have is to be able to help others regardless of what the income. It is the smile on someone else's face and happiness that matters.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: It is a way my wife and I can make a difference in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students that have learning disabilities, difficulties with reading and / or writing.

lenders.name: Jeramie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have an opportunity to become what they are willing to work for.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer guy.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: it combines philanthropy with online shopping. What could be better?! :)
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate programming and curricula for adolescents, in areas like substance use and sexual health.

lenders.name: Lynsky Family Kids
lenders.loan_because: I want my kids to understand that they (ages, 9,6, 4, 2) can have a positive impact on others lives.  Two of my kids gave every bit of money they had saved to help Vilma.
lenders.occupational_info: rasing great kids that will help benefit the world!

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: How can I not loan when I have been blessed  with so much and Kiva makes it  so easy to help others?
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher.
